summary: The Contoso Wireless phone is a top-of-the-line device that comes with a 20MP camera, a 4500 mAh battery, and a 6-inch HD display. It has 128GB of internal storage and is expandable up to 256GB. It also supports dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, and 4G LTE for connectivity. Additionally, it is IP67 rated for dust and water resistance, has facial recognition technology and fingerprint scanning for added security, and runs on the latest version of Android. A one-year limited warranty is included with the phone which covers manufacturer defects and other issues that may arise during normal use.
